articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.title: Meet Microsoft Office's new default font: Aptos - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft is changing the default font in Office apps for the first time in 16 years. Aptos is the new default to replace the widely used Calibri font.
articles.content:
Meet Microsoft Offices new default font: Aptos
Meet Microsoft Offices new default font: Aptos
 / Word, Outlook, PowerPoint, and Excel all get a new default font today.
ByTom Warren, a senior edito… [+3098 chars]

articles.author: Luke Andrews
articles.title: I wasn't diagnosed with Down syndrome until I turned 23 - here are the subtle symptoms I ignored - Daily Mail
articles.description: Ashley Zambelli, 23, from Michigan, has mosaic Down syndrome where only some of her cells have an extra chromosome. This means that some symptoms of the condition may not be clear.
articles.content:
A woman from Michigan was diagnosed with Down syndrome at the age of 23 despite not showing any obvious symptoms.
Ashley Zambelli was only given confirmation of the condition this February after und… [+5704 chars]

articles.author: Tony Onuchukwu, Ellie Bury, Ian Sample
articles.title: Has a 25-year-old bet taken us a step closer to understanding consciousness? – podcast - The Guardian
articles.description: Twenty-five years ago in a German bar, neuroscientist Christof Koch bet philosopher David Chalmers that we’d understand the neural basis for consciousness by 2023. Last month, the winner of the bet received a case of wine. Ian Sample talks to Christof and Dav…
